text: Hi everybody! We launched our new HubSpot CMS website <http://www.made2grow.de|www.made2grow.de> last week. In chrome I got the message that it is creating too many redirects, but Safari and Firefox was fine. For others, such as colleagues, chrome works fine. So, it must be a bug on my end. Probably an extension. I didn’t bother until today because Safari and Firefox are showing me the same error message because of too many redirects. Any idea how to fix this?
where are you getting that message? i’m using chrome and not seeing it.

Safari and Firefox works now :man-shrugging: But I swear it showed the same message. It says site does not work. <http://www.made2grow.de|www.made2grow.de> is redirecting too often. Delete cookies. Did that a couple of times. I read that extensions might cause a cookie/cache error, but in inkognito mode I see the same issue. And extensions should be deactivated.
